hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #1# major item.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Map of the Fire Temple#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Deku Stick#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers #Talon's House#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #4# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #Bombchus (10 pieces)# and #a Water Temple Small Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #the Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #a Wallet# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that you're wasting time reading this hint, but I disagree. Talk to me again!

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Did you know that Barinade is allergic to bananas?

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Megaton Hammer Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Minuet of Forest#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path of time.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Compass Room Side Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Map of the Fire Temple#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Milk Bottle#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #the Song of Storms#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Minuet of Forest#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #a Green Rupee# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the final item you're looking for can be found somewhere in Hyrule.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Center Room Pit Fall Blue Rupee 1

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #3# major items.
